content:
There's a recent chat thread that I think is related to some of our recent discussions around DiagnosticReport
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179256-Orders-and.20Observation.20WG/topic/Query.20intent.20of.20DiagnosticReport.20resource
Not clear to me they are using our use case, but seems they have others. Can we ensure they are including ours?
